If want to use Claude Code but are don't like the terminal interface, you can now use local Claude Code from Claude Desktop!

To do so: 
1. download Claude Desktop 
2. open the sidebar and click 'Code' toggle
3. select the folder that you want Claude Code to have access to 
4. submit your prompt!

Claude Code is now available in our desktop app.
